only_live.label: Script works only live
only_live.tooltip: Checkbox for the script to only work live

exempt.label: Caster is exempt from tool use
exempt.tooltip: Enable when Caster doesn't need a tool to use commands (only works for Twitch)

store_message.value: $user current $nametools in store is: $tools. Use $buycommand Type to buy the tool.
store_message.label: Store message
store_message.tooltip:
Message for store
$nametools - name of tools
$user - username
$tools - Gets formatted with the textbox below
$buycommand - the buy command

format_store.label: Format of $tools in Store Message
format_store.tooltip:
Format of the $tools in store message
$type - tool type
$durability - durability
$price - price

buy_message.label: Buy message
buy_message.tooltip:
Message when a tool gets bought
$user - username
$price - price
$tooltype - type of tool
$nametools - general tool name
$currencyname - currency of channel

cant_buy_message.value: $user you don't have enough currency to buy that!
cant_buy_message.label: Can't Buy message
cant_buy_message.tooltip:
Message when a tool can't be bought
$user - username

buy_incorrect.value: $user that isn't a valid option to buy
buy_incorrect.label: Incorrect buy option
buy_incorrect.tooltip:
Message when a tool can't be bought
$user - username

status_command.label: Status command
status_command.tooltip:
command for checking your current tool status
$user - username

status_message.label: Status message
status_message.tooltip:
Status message when tool is equipped
$user - username
$tooltype - type of tool
$nametools - name of tools
$durability - durability

no_status_message.value: $user you currently have no tool equipped. use $buycommand to buy a tool
no_status_message.label: Status message for no tool equipped
no_status_message.tooltip:
Status message when no tool is equipped
$user - user
$buycommand - command for store

tool_used_message.value: $user used his $tooltype $nametools to activate this command.
tool_used_message.label: Message for using a command with tool use
tool_used_message.tooltip:
Message when tool is used
$user - user
$tooltype - tool type
$nametools - name of tools

tool_broke.value: $user used his $tooltype $nametools but the durability dropped to 0! Your tool is now broken!
tool_broke.label: Message for when tool breaks
tool_broke.tooltip:
Message when tool is used
$user - user
$tooltype - tool type
$nametools - name of tools

AddTool_message_succes.value: $user the tool has been succesfully added
AddTool_message_succes.label: Message for adding tools

Altertool_message_fail.value: $user the syntax is [$addtool $addformat] for adding a tool and [$addtool -toolname] for removing a tool.
Altertool_message_fail.label: Message for failing to add tools
Altertool_message_fail.tooltip:
Message for failing to add tools
$user - username
$alter - alter tool command
$addformat - format for adding tools

RemoveTool_message_succes.label: Message for removing tools
RemoveTool_message_succes.tooltip:
Message for removing to add tools
$user - username

RemoveTool_message_fail.label: Message for failing to remove tools
RemoveTool_message_fail.tooltip:
Message for failing to remove tools
$user - username
$alter - alter command
